metadata.title: CVE-2014-0477 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The parse function in Email::Address module before 1.905 for Perl uses aninefficient regular expression, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (CPU consumption) via an empty quoted string in an RFC2822 address.

criterions.comment: libemail-address-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
